title: Didn't get free icon
body: I didn't receive my free party icon even though I received the Kayle skin and I meet all the requirements.

replies.body:
We're sending stuff out in batches, so with your patience, we'll get it all out. 

If you're still missing the icon by the 23rd, let me know.
Its the 23rd, and I still do not have the icon, thank you for your help by the way

Thanks for getting back to me about this. It looks like we're still sending content out and the new deadline is the 30th.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
